attributes.action: Introduce legislation to make the discrimination of obese people in any way shape or form a criminal offence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, feel that overweight people are suffering unbearable forms of discrimination and bullying in the work-place, schools and society in general and vilification in the media purely due to their size.  This results in their withdrawal from society and a complete loss of a person’s self-esteem thus creating a vicious circle. This is not acceptable and must be outlawed.
